# Iterative gene search

```{r iterative-gene-search, message = FALSE}


n_genes_total = 250

activation_status = c("Baseline", "CD3_CD28", "IgM_IgG", "LPS")

genes = bplapply(activation_status , function(id){
  current.sce = sce[, sce$HTO_Classification == id]
  current.sce = retain_informative_genes(current.sce, var.thresh = 0)
  
  genes = gene_search(current.sce , genes_base = NULL, n_genes_total = n_genes_total, batch = "Donor_of_Origin")
  saveRDS(genes , paste0(root.dir , "data/gene_selection/" , system , "/" , "gene_selection_", id, ".Rds"))
  return(NULL)
}, BPPARAM = mcparam)



```
